title: rE maanasa bhajarE
sahitya:
rE rE mAnasa bhajarE gajAnanam 
(rE)

anupallavi

sArasAra vihAram sakala purANA sAram kAruNyAmrtapUram
kAmAkSi mOdakaram 
(rE)

caraNam

kanjAsana mukha suramuni vanditapada caritam kAncIpura nAtha
sutam karNa cAmaramtam
manjuLa kanakAbharaNa mancitam atitAntam sinjanmanjIrayutam
cengalvarAyanatam 
(rE)
